org.forgerock.openidm.repo.orientdb.impl

Class DocumentUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openidm.repo.orientdb.impl.DocumentUtil

  • public class DocumentUtil
extends Object
    A utility class for handling and converting OrientDB ODocuments

    • Method Detail

      • toResource

        public static org.forgerock.json.resource.Resource toResource(com.orientechnologies.orient.core.record.impl.ODocument doc)
        Convert to JSON object structures (akin to simple binding), composed of the basic Java types: Map, List, String, Number, Boolean.
        Parameters:
        doc - the OrientDB document to convert
        Returns:
        the Resource with the id, rev, and the doc converted into maps, lists, java types; or null if the doc was null
        Throws:
        JsonException - when the JSON can not be parsed

      • toMap

        public static Map<String,Object> toMap(com.orientechnologies.orient.core.record.impl.ODocument doc)
        Convert to JSON object structures (akin to simple binding), composed of the basic Java types: Map, List, String, Number, Boolean.
        Parameters:
        doc - the OrientDB document to convert
        Returns:
        the doc converted into maps, lists, java types; or null if the doc was null

      • toDocument

        public static com.orientechnologies.orient.core.record.impl.ODocument toDocument(org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue objModel,
                                                                 com.orientechnologies.orient.core.record.impl.ODocument docToPopulate,
                                                                 com.orientechnologies.orient.core.db.document.ODatabaseDocumentTx db,
                                                                 String orientDocClass)
                                                                          throws org.forgerock.json.resource.ConflictException
        Convert from JSON object structures (akin to simple binding), composed of the basic Java types: Map, List, String, Number, Boolean. to OrientDB document
        Parameters:
        objModel - the JSON object structure to convert
        docToPopulate - an optional existing ODocument to update with new values from objModel
        db - the database to associate with the ODocument
        orientDocClass - the OrientDB class of the ODocument to create
        Returns:
        the converted orientdb document, or null if objModel was null
        Throws:
        org.forgerock.json.resource.ConflictException - when the revision in the Object model is invalid

      • toDocument

        public static com.orientechnologies.orient.core.record.impl.ODocument toDocument(Map<String,Object> objModel,
                                                                 com.orientechnologies.orient.core.record.impl.ODocument docToPopulate,
                                                                 com.orientechnologies.orient.core.db.document.ODatabaseDocumentTx db,
                                                                 String orientDocClass)
                                                                          throws org.forgerock.json.resource.ConflictException
        Convert from JSON object structures (akin to simple binding), composed of the basic Java types: Map, List, String, Number, Boolean. to OrientDB document
        Parameters:
        objModel - the JSON object structure to convert
        docToPopulate - an optional existing ODocument to update with new values from objModel
        db - the database to associate with the ODocument
        orientDocClass - the OrientDB class of the ODocument to create
        Returns:
        the converted orientdb document, or null if objModel was null
        Throws:
        org.forgerock.json.resource.ConflictException - when the revision in the Object model is invalid

      • toDocument

        protected static com.orientechnologies.orient.core.record.impl.ODocument toDocument(Map<String,Object> objModel,
                                                                 com.orientechnologies.orient.core.record.impl.ODocument docToPopulate,
                                                                 com.orientechnologies.orient.core.db.document.ODatabaseDocumentTx db,
                                                                 String orientDocClass,
                                                                 boolean patch,
                                                                 boolean topLevel)
                                                                             throws org.forgerock.json.resource.ConflictException
        Convert from JSON object structures (akin to simple binding), composed of the basic Java types: Map, List, String, Number, Boolean. to OrientDB document
        Parameters:
        objModel - the JSON object structure to convert
        docToPopulate - an optional existing ODocument to update with new values from objModel
        db - the database to associate with the ODocument
        orientDocClass - the OrientDB class of the ODocument to create
        patch - whether the objModel passed in is only partial values (replacing and adding values), or if false replaces the whole document with the given objModel
        topLevel -
        Returns:
        the converted orientdb document, or null if objModel was null
        Throws:
        org.forgerock.json.resource.ConflictException - when the revision in the Object model is invalid

      • parseVersion

        public static int parseVersion(String revision)
                        throws org.forgerock.json.resource.ConflictException
        Parse an OpenIDM revision into an OrientDB MVCC version. OrientDB expects these to be ints.
        Parameters:
        revision - the revision String with the OrientDB version in it.
        Returns:
        the OrientDB version
        Throws:
        org.forgerock.json.resource.ConflictException - if the revision String could not be parsed into the int expected by OrientDB
